attributes.description:
OPTIONAL 12 MONTH WARRANTY AVAILABLE 

THIS VEHICLE IS IN GREAT CONDITION. A MUST SEE!!
COME AND VIEW!
WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE, SERVICE THE WHOLE OF THE GAUTENG REGION AND WE ARE BASED JUST 40 MIN FROM JHB.
FINANCE CAN BE ARRANGED!
TRADE-INS WELCOME!
Why you must buy from Koos&Mike used cars:
1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)
2. All our cars comes with a AA/DEKRA roadworthy certificate.
3. All cars will be delivered with a oil service before delivery.
4. Paperwork is our priority and not your responsibility in our town.
5. Finance approvals is our goal.
6. You are our customer our advertisement and our reference for tomorrow.
7. The first 5 services on the car will be half price.
8. Warranty option available on all our cars (not included in selling price, can be taken out additionally)
9. We buy decent cars for cash.
10. We make a video of the cars delivery as a gift to the client.
11. Ts & Cs APPLY

attributes.description: Spacious, Comfortable And Fit For A City Drive And Other Roads. This Fantastic 1 OWNER 2021 Model Is An Excellent Choice For Families. It Is Presented In White With A Luscious Black Leather Interior And Satin Silver Interior Trim. It Has A LOW MILEAGE Of ONLY 27 000km And Retains A Full Service History And Balance Of A 2 Year Or 30 000 km Service Plan Ending November 2022 As Well As A Balance Of 5 Year Or 200 000 km Warranty Plan. Features Include A Multi Functional Steering Wheel, Bluetooth, Multimedia System With USB And Auxiliary Input, Air Conditioner, 4 Electric Windows, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint, Aluminium Roof Rack And 16 Inch Alloy Wheels. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252681. Comes with the remainder of a 5 year or 150 000kms warranty and a 3 year or 75 000kms maintenance plan.
This is a really great SUV, only a year and a half old, still in excellent condition and very low mileage.
The Forester is a comfortable, spacious and safe family vehicle that is sturdy and stable on the road. This great vehicle has permanent symmetrical all wheel drive, so it can handle more than just tar roads. This is a perfect family adventure vehicle.
Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
Please note that the advertised price does not include admin fees of R8500 which will be charged on all vehicles sold.
